about_us.title: ABOUT US
about_us.description1: Loop is an international freight forwarder company committed, through our digital platform and specialized agents, to provide the best, clearest and fastest solutions to our clients.
about_us.description2: Our services feature air, land, and ocean freights. Every shipment is client customized to guarantee the finest delivery.
about_us.description3: At Loop, we believe that integrity and customer satisfaction are key to growing our business.
about_us.description4: We trust in being a safe and responsible company, offering friendly environmental technology in all our services.

services.title: SERVICES
services.service1_desc: In loop we transport your goods by land guaranteeing delivery times and competitive prices in the industry.
services.service1_include:
• Full Cargo (FTL)
    • Dry goods
    • Flat Bed Platforms
    • Low Beds
    • Drayage
  • Less Than Truckload (LTL)
  • Iso Tanks
services.service2_desc: At loop we understand that international shipments are critical for the supply chain, for this reason, we offer air transportation services, in which we guarantee security and speed.
services.service3_desc: Loop's ocean freight services guarantee security in your shipments from port to port as well as deliveries in a timely manner in the main ports of the world.
services.service3_include:
• Full Container Loads (Dry, High Cube, Reefer, Opet Top, etc.)
  • Consolidated Cargo
  • Less than Container Loads
  • Iso Tanks
  • Flexi Bags
services.service4_desc: Because we understand that in a healthy supply chain it is not enough to have quality and safe transportation, at loop we have storage services so that your inventory can remain in the locations that best meet your needs.
services.service5_desc: At loop we understand that the needs of our clients transcend borders, for them we offer our international services, which include:
services.text_summary_service: If you are interested in knowing more, do not hesitate to contact us and we will gladly answer all your questions.
services.value_desc1: Focus on growing your business by optimizing your working capital without taking on additional debt, we offer deferred payment terms.
services.value_desc2: Protect yourself against accidents or robbery with our digital platform you will get the possibility of tracking your status at any time.
services.value_desc3: Follow your load from origin to destination, receive alerts, automatic reports, access to all documentations, charts and interactive map with your shipment position.
services.value_desc4: We grant you up to 120 days credit from Bill of Lading so you can import more and optimize the working capital of your company.

login.legend_desc: We make it simple to ship cargo - with online quoting, booking, shipment tracking and more.
